title: US and Russia Plan Ukraine Truce
description: On the early edition of Balance of Power, Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu discusses the United States and Russia engaging in possible peace talks over Ukraine. On today's show, Yale Budget Lab Director of Economics Ernie Tedeschi, Stonecourt Capital Partner Rick Davis, Center for the Study of the Presidency and Congress Senior Democracy Fellow Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and former Deputy Secretary of State Wendy Sherman. (Source: Bloomberg)
